title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
you could help me with the parasite in my head. I've heard you're an unmatched healer. I need your help. I've been to the emerald Grove. It's in danger. You should get out of here. It's not safe.

Choosing dialogue 2 will have Halsin tell you to just call him by his name. You will have the same dialogues to choose from. Choosing dialogue 5 will reveal that Halsin is aware of the situation at the Emerald Grove, he notices the look on your face and examines you, making him aware of your parasite.
